Articles.Content: You hate on wireless internet? That's clearly siding with North Korea because you're slightly anti-wireless communication. CHEATER!

Calling a cheater a cheater?

YOU BEATER!
You didn't call anyone a cheater? CHEATING!
Cheater because everyone grr grr grr someone else is cheating.

Calling everybody a cheater?!

YOU BEATER!!!!/!?111!?!!1!!11!/1?!
Calling everyone a beater instead of a cheater? thats kinda defacing the game there, buddy. and can you guess what that is called? CHEATING! go crawl back down the cheater hole you came from.
Asking people for reputation in your signature!? You dirty, FILTHY cheater!
Incorrectly accusing me of asking for rep? cheater! I said "don't be scared to" and according to reality, that is not asking. only cheaters corrupt reality like you!
cheater because even when we try not to cheat everyone in this thread including me cheat intentionnaly or un-intentionally or an un-mesured and scaled way for a random reader

hmmmmm...... for the reason that i cannot understand that sentence at all, i call you a cheater, sir. Good people who don't cheat use correct sentence structure, and all forms of grammar.

If english isn't your mother tongue, disregard this
This is the 2010s, we text, we don't text by grammar rules. It's not like grammar rules are laws. CHEATER!
This isn't 2010! IT'S FRIGGIN 2222!! You Cheeter!
This isn't 2222! This is SPARTA! CHEATER!

This isn't 2222! This is SPARTA! CHEATER!

Quoteing a movie, that is cheeting... modifying the quote,THIS IS WINNING
Look at that huge avatar! Cheetah.
10 fingers?! Non-cheaters have 8 you scum!
Math! He used math! CHEATER!
Non-cheaters having 8 fingers? Really? LIAR! Only people with a freak genetic condition have 8.

Replying to an already replied-to post?!

CHEATER!
Dude, replying to a reply to a post that's already been replied to is totally cheating. Replying to a reply to a reply to a pre-replied post, however, is not.
You have *ERROR IN DATA TRANSMISSION* Cheater!

You aren't using a correct sentence!

Cheater!
Signature in hex? Cheating with a capital C. Real ascii is done in straight up, old fashioned binary. (Also, good luck burning my house down with lemons.)
Only cheaters understand that stuff, that's the only explanation.
No words in your signature? Cheater!
